tourneyHeaderSubtitle: Tournament information for Archon filling purposes
tourneyItemCityLabelSubtitle: City in which the tournament is taking place.
tourneyItemFormatLabelSubtitle: Constructed is a format where all cards legal for tournament play are allowed. Limited is a format where a subset of the valid cards are allowed for a tournament. For instance, drafts are a limited format.
tourneyItemNumberOfRoundsLabelSubtitle: Number of rounds played at this tournament.  The number of rounds in a V:EKN-sanctioned V:TES tournament must be at least 3 (which includes 2 Preliminary and 1 Final Round).
tourneyItemMultiJudgeSystemLabelSubtitle: This indicates whether the tournament used the multi-judge system (6 judges, all of whom played in the tournament), rather than all non-playing Judges.
tourneyItemExportLabelSubtitle: Exports tournament data. You can load it later via the import button
tourneyItemResetLabelSubtitle: Keeps player data but removes rounds and results
summaryAddPlayerHeaderSubtitle: Fill out this information to register a new player
summaryEditPlayerHeaderSubtitle: Make changes in a player's profile
emptyRoundSubtitle: Round is still not initialized. Generate it automatically or manually import seatings
tableReportSubtitle: Select how many VPs each player made in this round.
settingsItemThemeLabelSubtitle: Your preferred color scheme while navigating
settingsItemUpdateDbLabelSubtitle: Reloads VEKN Player DB. Use this if you can't find a player by its VEKN id
